text: ISG Luxury Management is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in Geneva, Switzerland and in Paris, Bordeaux, Lille, Lyon, Montpellier, Nantes, Nice, France. The business school is specialist in the fields of luxury, fashion and jewellery.Franck Belaich: «Le luxe s’est énormément paupérisé» ==References== == Further reading == * ISG Luxury Management website for Switzerland * ISG Luxury Management website for France Category:Colleges and universities in Switzerland Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:Organizations based in Geneva
title: ISG Luxury Management
